00115 /* Hashtable used to cache the hostname, accessed by their IP addess */
00116 hash_table_t            * ht_pwnam ;
00117 hash_table_t            * ht_grnam ;
00118 hash_table_t            * ht_pwuid ;
00119 hash_table_t            * ht_grgid ;
00120 hash_table_t            * ht_uidgid ;
00121 
00122 extern nfs_parameter_t    nfs_param ;

00141 unsigned long idmapper_value_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef )
00142 {
00143   unsigned int  sum = 0 ;
00144   unsigned int  i = 0 ;
00145   unsigned char c ;
00146 
00147   /* Compute the sum of all the characters */
00148   for( i = 0 , c = ((char *)buffclef->pdata)[0] ; ((char *)buffclef->pdata)[i] != '\0' ; c=((char *)buffclef->pdata)[++i], sum += c ) ;
00149 
00150   return (unsigned long)( sum % p_hparam->index_size ) ;
00151 } /*  ip_name_value_hash_func */
00152 
00153 unsigned long namemapper_value_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef )
00154 {
00155    return ((unsigned long)(buffclef->pdata)  % p_hparam->index_size ) ;
00156 }
00157 
00172 unsigned long idmapper_rbt_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef )
00173 {
00174   unsigned int result ;
00175 
00176   if( idmap_compute_hash_value( (char *)buffclef->pdata,
00177                                 (uint32_t *) &result ) != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00178         return 0 ;
00179 
00180   return (unsigned long)result ;
00181 } /* ip_name_rbt_hash_func */
00182 
00183 unsigned long namemapper_rbt_hash_func( hash_parameter_t * p_hparam, hash_buffer_t * buffclef )
00184 {
00185    return (unsigned long)(buffclef->pdata)  ;
00186 }
00200 int compare_idmapper(  hash_buffer_t * buff1, hash_buffer_t * buff2 )
00201 {
00202   return strncmp( (char *)(buff1->pdata), (char *)(buff2->pdata), PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ;
00203 } /* compare_xid */
00204 
00205 int compare_namemapper(  hash_buffer_t * buff1, hash_buffer_t * buff2 )
00206 {
00207   unsigned long xid1 = (unsigned long)(buff1->pdata) ;
00208   unsigned long xid2 = (unsigned long)(buff2->pdata) ;
00209 
00210   return (xid1 == xid2)?0:1 ;
00211 } /* compare_xid */

00263 int idmap_uid_init( nfs_idmap_cache_parameter_t param )
00264 {
00265   if( ( ht_pwnam = HashTable_Init( param.hash_param ) ) == NULL )
00266     {
00267         DisplayLog( "NFS ID MAPPER: Cannot init IDMAP_UID cache" ) ;
00268         return -1 ;
00269     }
00270 
00271   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00272 } /* idmap_uid_init */
00273 
00274 int uidgidmap_init( nfs_idmap_cache_parameter_t param )
00275 {
00276   if( ( ht_uidgid = HashTable_Init( param.hash_param ) ) == NULL ) 
00277     {
00278         DisplayLog( "NFS UID/GID MAPPER: Cannot init UIDGID_MAP cache" ) ;
00279         return -1 ;
00280     }
00281 
00282   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00283 } /* idmap_uid_init */
00284

00286 {

00288     {
00289         DisplayLog( "NFS ID MAPPER: Cannot init IDMAP_UNAME cache" ) ;

00329 
00338 int idmap_compute_hash_value( char      * name,
00339                               uint32_t  * phashval )
00340 {
00341   char         padded_name[PWENT_MAX_LEN] ;
00342   uint64_t     computed_value = 0 ;
00343   unsigned int i              = 0 ;
00344   unsigned int offset         = 0 ;
00345   uint64_t     extract        = 0 ;
00346   uint64_t     sum            = 0 ;
00347   uint64_t     i1 ;
00348   uint64_t     i2 ;
00349   uint64_t     i3 ;
00350   uint64_t     i4 ;
00351   uint64_t     i5 ;
00352   uint64_t     i6 ;
00353   uint64_t     i7 ;
00354   uint64_t     i8 ;
00355   uint64_t     i9 ;
00356   uint64_t     l  ;
00357 
00358   if( name == NULL || phashval == NULL )
00359     return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00360 
00361   memset( padded_name, 0, PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ;
00362 
00363   /* Copy the string to the padded one */
00364   for( i = 0 ; i < strnlen( name, PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ; padded_name[i] = name[i], i++ ) ;
00365 
00366 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_PWHASH_COMPUTE
00367   printf( "#%s# :", padded_name ) ; 
00368 #endif
00369 
00370   /* For each 9 character pack:
00371    *   - keep the 7 first bit (the 8th is often 0: ascii string) 
00372    *   - pack 7x9 bit to 63 bits using xor
00373    *   - xor the last 8th bit to a single 0 , or-ed with the rest
00374    * Proceeding with the next 9 bytes pack will produce a new value that is xored with the 
00375    * one of the previous iteration */
00376 
00377   for( offset = 0 ; offset < PWENT_MAX_LEN ; offset += 9 )
00378     {
00379       /* input name is ascii string, remove 8th bit on each byte, not significant */
00380       i1 = padded_name[offset+0] & 0x7F ;
00381       i2 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+1] & 0x7F ) << 7 ; 
00382       i3 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+2] & 0x7F ) << 14 ; 
00383       i4 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+3] & 0x7F ) << 21 ; 
00384       i5 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+4] & 0x7F ) << 28 ; 
00385       i6 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+5] & 0x7F ) << 35 ; 
00386       i7 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+6] & 0x7F ) << 42 ; 
00387       i8 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+7] & 0x7F ) << 49 ; 
00388       i9 = (uint64_t)( padded_name[offset+8] & 0x7F ) << 56 ; 
00389 
00390   sum = (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+0] +
00391         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+1] +
00392         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+2] +
00393         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+3] +
00394         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+4] +
00395         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+5] +
00396         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+6] +
00397         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+7] +
00398         (uint64_t)padded_name[offset+8] ;
00399 
00400 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_PWHASH_COMPUTE
00401       printf( "|%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx |%llx | = ",
00402              i1, i2, i3, i4, i5, i6, i7, i8, i9 ) ;
00403 #endif
00404 
00405       /* Get xor combibation of all the 8h bit */
00406       l = ( padded_name[offset+0] & 0x80 ) ^
00407           ( padded_name[offset+1] & 0x80 ) ^
00408           ( padded_name[offset+2] & 0x80 ) ^
00409           ( padded_name[offset+3] & 0x80 ) ^
00410           ( padded_name[offset+4] & 0x80 ) ^
00411           ( padded_name[offset+5] & 0x80 ) ^
00412           ( padded_name[offset+6] & 0x80 ) ^
00413           ( padded_name[offset+7] & 0x80 ) ^
00414           ( padded_name[offset+8] & 0x80 ) ;
00415     
00416       extract = i1 ^ i2 ^ i3 ^ i4 ^ i5 ^ i6 ^ i7 ^ i8 ^ i9 | l ;
00417 
00418 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_PWHASH_COMPUTE
00419       printf( "%llx ", extract ) ; 
00420 #endif
00421 
00422       computed_value ^= extract ;
00423       computed_value ^= sum ;
00424     }
00425 #ifdef WITH_PRINTF_DEBUG_PWHASH_COMPUTE
00426   printf( "\n" ) ; 
00427 #endif
00428 
00429     computed_value = (computed_value >> 32 ) + (computed_value & 0x00000000FFFFFFFFLL ) ;
00430 
00431   *phashval = (uint32_t)computed_value ;
00432 
00433 
00434   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00435 } /* idmap_compute_hash_value */
00436 
00450 int idmap_add( hash_table_t  * ht,
00451                char          * key,
00452                unsigned int    val )
00453 {
00454   hash_buffer_t     buffkey  ;
00455   hash_buffer_t     buffdata ;
00456   int               rc ;
00457   unsigned long     local_val = (unsigned long)val ;
00458 
00459   if( ht == NULL || key == NULL )
00460     return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00461 
00462   if( ( buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)Mem_Alloc( PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ) == NULL )
00463     return ID_MAPPER_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00464 
00465   /* Build the key */
00466   strncpy( (char*)(buffkey.pdata), key, PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ;
00467   buffkey.len = PWENT_MAX_LEN ;
00468 
00469   /* Build the value */
00470   buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)local_val ;
00471   buffdata.len   = sizeof( unsigned long ) ;
00472 
00473   rc = HashTable_Test_And_Set( ht, &buffkey, &buffdata, HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_SET_NO_OVERWRITE ) ;
00474 
00475   if( rc != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS && rc != HASHTABLE_ERROR_KEY_ALREADY_EXISTS )
00476      return ID_MAPPER_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00477 
00478   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00479 } /* idmap_add */
00480 
00481 int namemap_add( hash_table_t  * ht,
00482                  unsigned int    key,
00483                  char *          val )
00484 {
00485   hash_buffer_t     buffkey  ;
00486   hash_buffer_t     buffdata ;
00487   int               rc = 0 ;
00488   unsigned long     local_key = (unsigned long)key ;
00489 
00490   if( ht == NULL || val == NULL )
00491     return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00492 
00493   if( ( buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)Mem_Alloc( PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ) == NULL )
00494     return ID_MAPPER_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00495 
00496   /* Build the data */
00497   strncpy( (char*)(buffdata.pdata), val, PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ;
00498   buffdata.len = PWENT_MAX_LEN ;
00499 
00500   /* Build the value */
00501   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_key ;
00502   buffkey.len   = sizeof( unsigned int ) ;
00503 
00504   rc = HashTable_Test_And_Set( ht, &buffkey, &buffdata, HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_SET_NO_OVERWRITE ) ;
00505 
00506   if( rc != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS && rc != HASHTABLE_ERROR_KEY_ALREADY_EXISTS )
00507      return ID_MAPPER_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00508 
00509   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00510 } /* idmap_add */
00511 
00512 int uidgidmap_add( unsigned int   key,
00513                    unsigned int   value )
00514 {
00515   hash_buffer_t     buffkey  ;
00516   hash_buffer_t     buffdata ;
00517   int               rc = 0 ;
00518   unsigned long     local_key = (unsigned long)key ;
00519   unsigned long     local_val = (unsigned long)value ;
00520 
00521   /* Build keys and data, no storage is used there, caddr_t pointers are just charged */
00522   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_key ;
00523   buffkey.len   = sizeof( unsigned int ) ;
00524 
00525   buffdata.pdata = (caddr_t)local_val ;
00526   buffdata.len   = sizeof( unsigned int ) ;
00527 
00528   rc = HashTable_Test_And_Set( ht_uidgid, &buffkey, &buffdata, HASHTABLE_SET_HOW_SET_OVERWRITE ) ;
00529 
00530   if( rc != HASHTABLE_SUCCESS && rc != HASHTABLE_ERROR_KEY_ALREADY_EXISTS )
00531      return ID_MAPPER_INSERT_MALLOC_ERROR ;
00532 
00533   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00534 
00535 } /* uidgidmap_add */
00536 
00537 int uidmap_add(  char * key,  unsigned int  val )
00538 {
00539   int rc1 = 0 ; 
00540   int rc2 = 0 ;  
00541 
00542   rc1 = idmap_add( ht_pwnam, key, val ) ;
00543   rc2 = namemap_add( ht_pwuid, val, key ) ;
00544 
00545   if( rc1 != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00546      return rc1 ;
00547   else if( rc2 != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00548       return rc2 ;
00549 
00550   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00551 } /* uidmap_add */
00552 
00553 int unamemap_add( unsigned int key, char *  val )
00554 {
00555   int rc1 = 0 ;
00556   int rc2 = 0 ;
00557   
00558   rc1 = namemap_add( ht_pwuid, key, val ) ;
00559   rc2 = idmap_add( ht_pwnam, val, key ) ;
00560 
00561   if( rc1 != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00562      return rc1 ;
00563   else if( rc2 != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00564       return rc2 ;
00565 
00566   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00567 } /* unamemap_add */
00568 
00569 int gidmap_add(  char * key,  unsigned int  val )

00576

00585 int gnamemap_add( unsigned int key, char *  val )
00586 {
00587   int rc1 = 0 ;
00588   int rc2 = 0 ;
00589 
00590   rc1 = namemap_add( ht_grgid, key, val ) ;
00591   rc2 = idmap_add( ht_grnam, val, key ) ;
00592 
00593   if( rc1 != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00594      return rc1 ;
00595   else if( rc2 != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00596      return rc2 ;
00597 
00598   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00599 } /* gnamemap_add */
00600 
00614 int idmap_get( hash_table_t   * ht,
00615                char           * key,
00616                unsigned long  * pval )
00617 {
00618   hash_buffer_t     buffkey  ;
00619   hash_buffer_t     buffval ;
00620   int               status ;
00621 
00622   if( ht == NULL || key == NULL || pval == NULL )
00623     return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00624 
00625   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)key ;
00626   buffkey.len   = PWENT_MAX_LEN ;
00627 
00628   if( HashTable_Get( ht, &buffkey, &buffval ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00629     {
00630         *pval = (unsigned long)buffval.pdata ;
00631 
00632         status = ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00633     }
00634   else
00635     {
00636         status = ID_MAPPER_NOT_FOUND ;
00637     }
00638   
00639   return status ;
00640 } /* idmap_get */
00641 
00642 int namemap_get( hash_table_t  * ht,
00643                  unsigned int    key,
00644                  char          * pval )
00645 {
00646   hash_buffer_t     buffkey  ;
00647   hash_buffer_t     buffval ;
00648   int               status ;
00649   long              local_key = (long)key ;
00650 
00651   if( ht == NULL || pval == NULL )
00652     return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00653 
00654   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_key ;
00655   buffkey.len   = sizeof( unsigned long ) ;
00656 
00657   if( HashTable_Get( ht, &buffkey, &buffval ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00658     {
00659         strncpy( pval, (char *)buffval.pdata , PWENT_MAX_LEN ) ;
00660 
00661         status = ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00662     }
00663   else
00664     {
00665         status = ID_MAPPER_NOT_FOUND ;
00666     }
00667   
00668   return status ;
00669 } /* idmap_get */
00670 
00671 int uidgidmap_get( unsigned int    key,
00672                    unsigned int  * pval )
00673 {
00674   hash_buffer_t     buffkey  ;
00675   hash_buffer_t     buffval ;
00676   int               status ;
00677   long              local_key = (long)key ;
00678 
00679    if( pval == NULL )
00680     return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00681 
00682   buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_key ;
00683   buffkey.len   = sizeof( unsigned long ) ;
00684 
00685   if( HashTable_Get( ht_uidgid, &buffkey, &buffval ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00686     {
00687         memcpy( (char *)pval, &(buffval.pdata), sizeof( unsigned int ) ) ;
00688         status = ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00689     }
00690   else
00691     {
00692         /* WIth RPCSEC_GSS, it may be possible that 0 is not mapped to root */
00693         if( key == 0 )
00694          {
00695            *pval = 0 ;
00696            status = ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00697          }
00698         else
00699          status = ID_MAPPER_NOT_FOUND ;
00700     }
00701   
00702   return status ;
00703 
00704 } /* uidgidmap_get */
00705 
00706 int uidmap_get( char          * key,
00707                unsigned long  * pval )
00708 {
00709    return idmap_get( ht_pwnam, key, pval ) ;
00710 }

00713                   char         * val )

00715    return namemap_get( ht_pwuid, key, val ) ;
00716 }

00719                unsigned long  * pval )

00742 int idmap_remove( hash_table_t  * ht,
00743                   char          * key )
00744 {
00745    hash_buffer_t     buffkey, old_key  ;
00746    int               status ;  
00747 
00748    if( ht == NULL || key == NULL )
00749       return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00750 
00751    buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)key ;
00752    buffkey.len   = PWENT_MAX_LEN ;
00753 
00754    if( HashTable_Del( ht, &buffkey, &old_key, NULL ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00755      {
00756         status = ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00757         Mem_Free( old_key.pdata ) ;
00758      }
00759    else
00760      {
00761         status = ID_MAPPER_NOT_FOUND ;
00762      }
00763     
00764    return status ;
00765 } /* idmap_remove */
00766 
00767 int namemap_remove( hash_table_t  * ht,
00768                     unsigned int    key )
00769 {
00770    hash_buffer_t     buffkey, old_data  ;
00771    int               status ;  
00772    unsigned long     local_key = (unsigned long)key ;
00773 
00774    if( ht == NULL )
00775       return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00776 
00777    buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_key ;
00778    buffkey.len   = sizeof( unsigned long ) ;
00779 
00780    if( HashTable_Del( ht, &buffkey, NULL, &old_data ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00781      {
00782         status = ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00783         Mem_Free( old_data.pdata ) ;
00784      }
00785    else
00786      {
00787         status = ID_MAPPER_NOT_FOUND ;
00788      }
00789     
00790    return status ;
00791 } /* idmap_remove */
00792 
00793 int uidgidmap_remove( unsigned int key )
00794 {
00795    hash_buffer_t     buffkey, old_data  ;
00796    int               status ;  
00797    unsigned long     local_key = (unsigned long)key ;
00798 
00799    buffkey.pdata = (caddr_t)local_key ;
00800    buffkey.len   = sizeof( unsigned long ) ;
00801 
00802    if( HashTable_Del( ht_uidgid, &buffkey, NULL, &old_data ) == HASHTABLE_SUCCESS )
00803      {
00804         status = ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00805      }
00806    else
00807      {
00808         status = ID_MAPPER_NOT_FOUND ;
00809      }
00810     
00811    return status ;
00812 } /* uidgidmap_remove */

00842 int idmap_populate( char * path, idmap_type_t maptype ) 
00843 {
00844   config_file_t config_file ;
00845   config_item_t block ;
00846   int            var_max ;
00847   int            var_index ;
00848   int            err ;
00849   char         * key_name ;
00850   char         * key_value ;
00851   char           label[MAXNAMLEN] ;
00852   hash_table_t * ht = NULL ;
00853   hash_table_t * ht_reverse = NULL ;
00854   unsigned int   value = 0 ;
00855   int            rc = 0 ;
00856 
00857   config_file = config_ParseFile( path );
00858 
00859   if( !config_file )
00860    { 
00861      DisplayLog( "Can't open file %s", path ) ;
00862 
00863      return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00864    }
00865  
00866    switch( maptype )
00867     {
00868         case UIDMAP_TYPE:
00869            strncpy( label, CONF_LABEL_UID_MAPPER_TABLE, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00870            ht = ht_pwnam ;
00871            ht_reverse = ht_pwuid ;
00872            break ;
00873 
00874         case GIDMAP_TYPE:
00875            strncpy( label, CONF_LABEL_GID_MAPPER_TABLE, MAXNAMLEN ) ;
00876            ht = ht_grnam ;
00877            ht_reverse = ht_grgid ;
00878            break ;
00879 
00880         default:
00881            /* Using incoherent value */
00882            return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00883            break ;
00884      }
00885             
00886                 
00887 
00888    /* Get the config BLOCK */
00889   if( ( block = config_FindItemByName( config_file, label ) ) == NULL )
00890     {
00891       DisplayLog( "Can't get label %s in file %s", label, path ) ;
00892       return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00893     }
00894   else if ( config_ItemType(block) != CONFIG_ITEM_BLOCK )
00895     {
00896       /* Expected to be a block*/
00897       DisplayLog( "Label %s in file %s is expected to be a block", label, path ) ;
00898       return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00899     }
00900 
00901   var_max = config_GetNbItems( block );
00902 
00903   for( var_index = 0 ; var_index < var_max ; var_index++ )
00904     {
00905       config_item_t item;
00906     
00907       item = config_GetItemByIndex( block, var_index );
00908     
00909       /* Get key's name */
00910       if( ( err = config_GetKeyValue( item,
00911                                       &key_name,
00912                                       &key_value ) ) != 0 )
00913         {
00914           fprintf(stderr, "Error reading key[%d] from section \"%s\" of configuration file.\n",
00915                   var_index, label ) ;
00916           return ID_MAPPER_INVALID_ARGUMENT ;
00917         }
00918 
00919         value = atoi( key_value ) ;
00920 
00921         if( ( rc = idmap_add( ht, key_name, value ) ) != ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00922           return rc ;
00923 
00924 
00925         if( ( rc = namemap_add( ht_reverse, value, key_name ) ) !=  ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS )
00926           return rc ;
00927 
00928     }
00929 
00930   /* HashTable_Print( ht ) ; */
00931   /* HashTable_Print( ht_reverse ) ; */
00932 
00933   return ID_MAPPER_SUCCESS ;
00934 } /* idmap_populate_by_conf */
00935 
00936 
00952 void idmap_get_stats(  idmap_type_t maptype , hash_stat_t * phstat, hash_stat_t * phstat_reverse )
00953 {
00954   hash_table_t * ht = NULL ;
00955   hash_table_t * ht_reverse = NULL ;
00956 
00957   switch( maptype )
00958     {
00959         case UIDMAP_TYPE:
00960            ht = ht_pwnam ;
00961            ht_reverse = ht_pwuid ;
00962            break ;
00963 
00964         case GIDMAP_TYPE:
00965            ht = ht_grnam ;
00966            ht_reverse = ht_grgid ;
00967            break ;
00968 
00969         default:
00970            /* Using incoherent value */
00971            return ;
00972            break ;
00973      }
00974 
00975 
00976   HashTable_GetStats( ht, phstat ) ;
00977   HashTable_GetStats( ht_reverse, phstat_reverse ) ;
00978 
00979 } /* idmap_get_stats */
